thread.title: The Agonizing Question at the Heart of North Korean Diplomacy

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: The Agonizing Question at the Heart of North Korean Diplomacy
text:
The vibes surrounding President Donald Trumpâ€™s planned summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un are pretty good at the moment, and good vibes are better than bad ones.

But here is the tougher underlying reality. Even a successful summit is likely to mark merely the start of prolonged and difficult negotiations with North Korea. And at the end, Mr. Trump could well come face-to-face with the same agonizing question looming ever since Pyongyang first tested a nuclear device: Will the U.S. be content merely to contain a nuclear...
